articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for March 23 - Bloomberg

articles.title: Macron digs in despite protests, stands by ‘no-alternative’ pensions reform - POLITICO Europe

articles.content:
PARIS French President Emmanuel Macron stood by his deeply unpopular pensions reform in his first TV appearance since a controversial decision last week to force through the legislation.
